name: Jetpack Astronaut (itch)
description:
In this game you play an astronaut that is stranded on a desert planet after his spaceship crashed. Find your way out by climbing to a higher point to be able to send a message from your radio.

This is just a prototype, but maybe I can expand the project in the future.

Have fun!

--- CREDITS ---

Level Tileset: m039 - https://m039.itch.io/

Music: Eric Skiff - Arpanauts - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music

--- CONTROLS ---

Left and Right Arrows: Move

Down: Fall through a platform

Up Arrow: Use Jetpack

Z: Jump

Z (on air): Double Jump
